resources.string: My name is Marlon Miller. I am a Senior Computer Science concentrated in Software Engineering. My hobbies are involved in chess, soccer, spending time with friends and family, and most importantly, God. I am from Honduras and this class is exciting because I have always been a fan of creating mobile apps and websites that can be published for the world to see. My favorite show is Attack on Titan, where the famous quote is: "TATAKAE!"
